airframe.name: booz2_a5
airframe.makefile:
USER = HOST = overo TARGET_DIR = ~
SRC_FMS=fms
test_spi.ARCHDIR = omap
test_spi.srcs=$(SRC_FMS)/test_spi.c
ap.ARCHDIR = $(ARCHI)
ap.LDFLAGS = -lm -levent -lrt
ap.CFLAGS += -I$(SRC_FMS)
ap.srcs=$(SRC_FMS)/fms_test_datalink.c
ap.CFLAGS += -DDOWNLINK ap.CFLAGS += -DDOWNLINK_TRANSPORT=UdpTransport ap.srcs += $(SRC_FMS)/fms_network.c ap.srcs += $(SRC_FMS)/udp_transport.c ap.srcs += downlink.c
